Because I take the rubble of man and build superstars. In my briefcase here is a doorway to a self-help sensation. Give me a minute, because I'd like to buy you a drink and change your life forever. I have a brochure --
Of all the friggin' bars to be stuck in.

If they can't reproduce anymore -- we are one step closer! A big step! Now is the time to band together. We need to rise up against these monsters of the night! Those creatures are no match for the human spirit! We can do it! We just need to believe in each other! In all of us! We need to make a stand! Right here! Right now!
"Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway."
No, I don't believe in guns.

Hey, it pays more than the couch.

Did you ever slaughter? Slaughter livestock?

Replies.Reply: I didn't do it! It was fuckin' monsters, asshole!
Why don't you go check it out?
See that you monkey fucks! That's what you get when you mess with us! Woman or man, I don't give a fuck! Shit don't make me gay because you'll be sucking my dick!
We? We learned fast? You are all that is left of we. No offense Pocohantas, but I think someone else should play "Chief" tonight. Someone that knows the lay of the land.
You gotta know somethin', you're old.
Old people know stuff like this. Legends, tall tales, shit like that.
How 'bout you? Or do I have to get rough?
The first order of business is gettin' a big fuckin' tampon in that cave!
They're probably on to the next buffet by now. There's a retirement home up the road, they'd be easy pickings.
Oh, now you have something to say?
That's for bears and sharks, chunky chew.
Do you drive a short beer bus or something? You go out there, you get eaten. You stay in here, you get eaten. Anyone comes to help, they get eaten. Don't you see a pattern here, Spuds Makenzie?
Believe me, I'd love to save the day and get some heroic snatch, but it's not in the cards, partner.
You're coming with, portly. 'Cause if I'm attacked, I want a fat man close by.
What are you gonna do? Throw your teeth at 'em? Sit down, Cocoon.
Alright you two, I don't want to hear any of this, "oh, I dropped the key, wrong key, ain't no key here." When I want out, I want out, ok?
Come on. Come on. Come on.
Okay, now. Easy steps. Easy breaths. Easy steps.
Just a bat! I'm okay! Just a bat!
Hello? Anyone there? We need help out here at the United Nations Tavern. Send guns, tanks, and all that shit. 10-4. S.O.S.
Repeat. We need help. SOS. Calling all cars! Calling all cars! We need help at the United Nations Tav --
Okay, I'm ready to come out now!
I got Papa in the stones.
This one's great under pressure. I wish you luck.
Ya know, that's not a bad look on you. Kinda 1985, but not bad. I'd hook it up.
Ya know, in situations of duress, I have found that women are attracted to my authority.
Ah-ah-ah! You're doing that all wrong!
I know you're doing it wrong.

Next time, look within. Stereotyping can be ugly and hurtful.
Excuse me for being forward, but I'm curious about your dimensions.

Just watch the floor and keep the others safe!
I need to get your number.
The fan has officially been buried in the shit.
I meant to tell you so much!
Lord, if I die, bury me upside down so the world can KISS MY ASS!
Get these cuffs off me! I'm a goddamn hero for Christ's sake!
Thanks for waitin' for me back there, really fuckin' appreciate it!
I found a new weak spot on 'em, but it damn ain't pretty getting to it.
That cash is gonna look much better in my pocket.
Now I haul this swill from armpit to armpit. I used to be a model for Christ's sake.
Yup, one keg of Beast for the basement, then the truck's dry.
So, what now? Did those things leave?
It's working. I think it's working.
I might be able to do something with the bottles.
I have a CB in my truck, we could get some help out here.
Then I guess we should just give up.
There's a sawed-off shotgun in here.
You aren't nearly as dumb as you look, are you?
When this lights, run like hell.
Save it. We don't deal in pamphlets 'round here. We stick to chemistry. And his drinks are on me.
If you're stayin', move the truck, boss gets pissed about you using primo parking.
Don't sweat it, just clean it up before he's done.
Hey! Get quiet or get out.
You hold it right there, mister.
I'll drop you and not even think about it!
The back phone is wrecked, too.
I got shells, too. Box and a half tops. Machete behind the bar.
Who the hell would you call?
The lot's too damn far, that's surefire suicide.
It runs about a hundred yards and spits out on the backside of that hill down the way.
You're trusting that con? He'll ditch us and never look back.
This is a bottleneck waiting to happen.
This ain't time for a political stance.
Don't be stupid, drop the gun!
I think we're in the clear --
And now, we head to our man on the scene with a live look at tomorrow's event in Red Mountain.
Listen, bud. I got a load ready to move and your man's not here.
I love a woman with enthusiasm.
Is there a gun pointing at you?
Alright goddamn it! Who shot me!? Who did it!?
My goddamn foot is gone! Who fuckin' shot me? Who fuckin' shot me!?
What the hell happened down here?!
So, your dead hubby shot me twice, three of my customers have been eaten, and there are angry creatures outside?
I have a short wave radio upstairs.
I've got some tools and extra planks in the kitchen, if we're on the same page here.
More importantly, how did you run away from these things?
In the kitchen, under the sink.
I got my .38 here. That's six shots and two refills. Downstairs, I have locker with a sawed-off and some gardening tools. Maybe a few boxes of shells.
Go for it. It's by the far wall. Channel 9 is the emergency frequency.
Morphine. My magic potion. I need a few drops.
You should try a little, it'll calm your nerves. Works like a charm.
Wait, before you do that, help me move. There's a small room off the kitchen where I can lay down.
It's much safer in there. Trust me.
I can't feel a thing, Hon.
You're a bad girl, aren't you.
You don't understand, sweety. Daddy doesn't pay. Daddy sees the show for free. But you do get points for being horny on a night like this.
You can't expect a man to buy a car without a test drive first, can you?
Now wiggle that sweet little ass over here and sit on Daddy's face, I wanna do some appraising.
Grass, man. I grow pot down there.
It spits out behind the parking lot.
My truck is near, but it ain't nearly big enough to haul the whole lot.
If you ask me, I'm gonna just lay right here, wait for sunrise, then walk on out of here.
He's coming. Relax. And if he doesn't show --
And the last one is the --
That studio's local, we can call in.
An associate of mine was coming in from the north, ain't heard a word from him in hours.
Looks like they're soft on the inside like any other animal. Trick is to get in there and do the damage.
If you don't mind me asking, how did you run into these things?
The three from the gas pump are over at the TV station? And you say there's four here, huh?
So we've got guns, kitchen knives, pipes, fire and sticks.
You don't need to know what that is.
That back room is sealed shut.
You handle yourself pretty well. You a cop or a criminal?
Oh yeah? Then how do you do it?
This place is creepy in the daytime, too. Ready?
Of course not. I fight monsters all the time.
They're trying to burrow through the tunnel walls.
He said there was no reason I had to stay a teller and that if I did good work and didn't mess up, I could become an assistant manager within three years.
Hello? Yes, we're at the United --
Jesus, it took all that? All those bullets? How can we possibly fight off the others?
How can you be so sure? You said yourself this started a day ago.
I can't get anybody. I don't even know if I have a signal anymore.
It serves you right for cheating.
It could be worse, you could be dead. Then again, the climax is upon us.
I wouldn't fuck you for practice.
What the fuck are you doing?!
Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!
You got her? You got her!
You can't keep me here. This is bullshit. Fuckin' bullshit. This is fucking BULLSHIT!
We're stuck in here. That's what.
Do you think they're gone? I haven't heard anything for a while, maybe they're gone.
Maybe these things are like locusts or something and only come out for a few days to feed. This could just be a part of their life cycle.
I'm telling you, I don't see a thing --
They can't get in here! We agreed! They'll get us!
I will not die because of her!
They'll get in! We'll all die!
Are you two all right? They left! We made it! I think we made it!
I'm sorry about your son. I really am.
I don't know, I just got here. Did you find your girl?
If I could made that kind of money, I'd be in Hollywood next week.
This is really happening. I can't believe this is really happening.
What's this? A power magnet or something?
I didn't peg you for a con man.
Lots of stuff around here does.
See! This has to be isolated. That's a local broadcast.
Maybe we don't have to fight them.
Is there a call, or something?
Somebody's gotta know something about these things. This stuff just doesn't happen out of the blue.
I know some first aid if we have a kit. Do we?
No other time than now, right?
How much you got to see the show?
Oh my god! My son! My SON!
Oh sweetheart! What was I thinking? Mommy is never gonna let you go!
Never, ever, never. Never, ever, never, baby. I love you --
There's some sweats in my bag behind the bar.
Shut up! Shut your mouth. You have no idea what is running through me right now. No idea.
Trust me, I plan on having a full breakdown when this is over, but for now, we all have to be strong, right?
Let's run for the cars, cause mass confusion.
Hey! Hey! She's in the shaft!
Don't worry about that. Just go.
This one will stun ya, but this one will put ya to sleep.
If I throw a stick, will you go away?
You're gonna need a whole lot more than that to get outta here alive.
You young'uns worry about weapons, I'm thinkin' 'bout strategy.
Sit still, look less like a meal.
Tuffy enters the room and takes off her blouse exposing her breasts. She pulls up her skirt and bends over a bedpost.
Hero is scraped, bruised and bloodied. He is dressed in blue denim and holds a RUST-RED SHOTGUN and GUNNY SACK.
Unless you people want to die you'll do what I say and you'll do it fast!
A storm of hell's coming down on this place any minute!
I'm not armed now, just hear me out.
Take a good look and listen to me! There's at least a four of these things out there!
I saw one of them tear up five men like they were corn on the cob!
I don't know what they are. I don't know where they came from. All I do know is that these fuckers are fast, nasty, and hungry.
And they can fly. Not to mention they got claws like Ginsu knifes and more teeth than a chainsaw.
They're like goddamn blood hungry biker tattoos come to life. They're clocking us. Right now. And we have to lock this bar down!
That means doors, windows, drains, and basements. We have to do it fast!
You! Get on that phone. Call the cops, National Guard, townies, whoever kicks ass and get 'em out here.
What's goin' on? The pumps are off.
Suck it down you metal bitch. Suck it down.

Bozo hustles in. The door shuts and locks.
Bozo rises and nervously surveys the damaged floor.
Bozo gets off the floor again. He may have filled his pants.
Bozo turns and points the gun around the room. He sees the CB. It is like an intercom with a cable running outside. He drops the shotgun and fidgets with the CB knobs.
Bozo bangs on the door and looks over his shoulder at the Momma and Papa Beast chomping at the wall.
Bozo kicks and punches the door.
SMACK! They spin to the noise.
Hero's right half is JERKED outside through the window.
Heroine spins and buries a splintered piece of the broken chair into the ATTACKING MOMMA BEAST'S RIGHT EYE. The Beast SCREECHES and jerks back, dragging the rest of Hero outside.
Beer Guy stares at the bile covered Bartender.
Belle kneels next to the Boss Man.
Heroine and the others, just returning from the basement, hear the mayhem from upstairs and the kitchen.
Heroine charges up the staircase. Roadie rips the sawed-off weapon from Beer Guy and runs for the kitchen.

The patrons track the wild CRASHING and HIGH-PITCHED SHRIEKING sounds of Papa Beast. He finally breaks out of the upstairs. Beer Guy and Roadie carry Boss Man into the room as Coach, Bartender, Heroine and the shaken Bozo creep down the stairs. Bozo slowly takes a seat in his brother's lap.
Tuffy backs up and hears the screams from the keg elevator.
Tuffy moves for the keg door. Adulterer grabs The Judge from Bartender.
Tuffy KNOCKS Adulterer's shotgun up, takes the gun, and rips open the keg door. Heroine swings out.
The jungle has a new king.
Easy. We're surrounded by something the likes none of you have ever seen before. Some kind of animals. Real fast, volatile, predators. One went through three of your patrons like nothing.
He shot you the other time.
That's one piece of four problems.

That head over there, that's the oldest of the bunch, looked like the Grandpa. We caught the little one, Junior, in the cooler there. As we've seen, what he lacks in size he more than makes up for in speed.
Unfortunately, the worst of 'em are still outside.
The next one is taller, but all out of proportion. Like a "teen beast."
He was spastic, clumsy, but deadly just the same.
I just took the eye out of the mother. She calculates, guiding the attacks.
If you are face to face with her, dive left.
No sign of any weaknesses. No sign at all. He's an eating machine.
We need to lock this place down. Is everyone in this room?

You can risk your life, but not mine! My daughter's no more than twenty miles from here waiting for me. I have just as much reason to leave this place as you do. But I also know that if they're here, then they're not there yet.
Now pull that tough boy shit again and I'll slice you from neck to nuts!
We can't risk letting them in.
Keep it together! I came from the east. That studio is south of here. For all we know, north and west are okay.
Aim for their orifices. Eyes, ears and mouth. From what I've seen, it's their only weakness.
So, how is staying with Grandma working out? Ya know, if you stare into her glasses, you can see what cards she is holding. But I didn't tell you that.
Mommy will pick you up tomorrow night, okay baby?

That first beam of sunlight drove 'em away. Somewhere. We called who we could and then decided to run for it. We didn't see a soul the whole drive out. When the tank went dry, we came upon a gas station to refill.
And that's how I ended up here.
I don't want to talk about that.
No. It was wild out there. No time to think. We just moved. He didn't leave me. He just ran.
As long as it's dark, they're around. They hide, wait for you to drop your guard, and then attack.
Everyone stay in the middle of the room! Off the walls! NOW!
Now, does everyone agree that they are still out there?
No one goes anywhere alone. Least of all, unarmed.
Alright, we need to stay alert and for everyone to take a role.
You gotta have some guns or weapons around here.
Alright, what else do we have? Can we somehow contact the outside world?
You said you had a short wave radio.
Good. I'm heading to the basement for supplies.
Those two will be on the other side waiting for you. If you become food, I don't want the only set of keys in the belly of one of those things.
Any volunteers to head into the basement with me?
This is my daughter, Charlie. She's all I'm after.
And I'm gonna need your strength, every bit of it.
Good. But still do me a favor.
Don't tell anyone I have a soft side.
I told you to stay in the main room.
We know what not to do. We must stay focused and together. The beasts will find a breach. We gotta find a way out before they find a way in.
You. What was that door downstairs?
Does the tunnel spit out near a car?
It's a shot. Is it gassed up?
Three of us go. Two to defend, one to drive. We back up to the bar and then tear ass out of here.
Let me make this clear; if we stay, we die.
Hey! I'm not trusting him either, that's why I'm going with.
This is it. They have this place surrounded, but if we go under them we might just make it.
The rest of you prepare the weapons, whatever you got left. 'Cause when we crash through those walls, we're bringin' death with us.
Send it up! Send it up!
Move it! Move it! Move it!
Stop trying to get people killed. It is getting very old.
Let's prepare ourselves, they ought to be here with the truck any minute.
That's your choice, but this is going to get a whole lot worse before it gets any better.
Get on the tables!!! On the tables!!!
Come and get me you blood-chugging CUNT!
Not for long, we gotta burn it.
Come on! Let's blow this thing!
We're safe until dark, but we need to find other people.
You know where the IGA grocery store is over in Red Mountain?
We're going to get my little girl.
It's right up there, in the back of the store.
She's supposed to already be here.
This place is a ghost town.
That's right, the crowds are lining up early to witness tomorrow's meteorological phenomenon.
But always remember, don't look straight into the sun because a special filter is needed to avoid damaging your cornea.
And we're all looking forward to it tomorrow. Back to you.
The basement is dark, dingy and scattered with crap. Dried out ANIMAL CARCASSES hang from the ceiling on hooks. A WINDOW is open. Roadie slams it shut, eyeing the room, staring into the dark corners.
Roadie emerges with two crates. He dumps them on the floor.
The room is like a converted pantry. Boss Man lies on a cot, kissing Belle. A tiny wall fan spins providing ventilation.
Belle rubs her hands over her rounded ass and flicks her tongue at Boss Man.
Belle, hearing the crash, jerks back from Boss Man.
Boss Man uses the cot to block the Sister Beasts from entering. They hiss and shred the cot fabric.
Boss Man is pulled towards the Sister Beasts.

Momma Beast falls back, knocking down Heroine. Momma Beast nearly falls out, but manages to grab the rear gate with one claw. Defenseless, Heroine backs away. Momma Beast holds on tightly, pulling herself onto the bed of the truck.
How many picked up the broadcast?
Get what you need to sell it.
Relax. We know. We're the calvary.
A trauma center. We have doctors waiting.
Do it quick and spread the mess.
Twenty miles. Red Mountain, surrounding farms, local TV studio.
We'll have figures within the hour.
